Personnel
The CPB proposal includes a salary schedule for three
persons including:
Bureau Chief
Reporter-Writer
Secretary-Journalist
An allocation for part-time personnel is included in the
grant request.
When the CPB grant is approved for the Public Affairs Bureau,
adequate financial support will be available for Phase II
and the expanded activity required of the duplication center.
Phase III Financial
A proposal for a National Public Radio System is now being
developed jointly by the Corporation for Public Broadcasting
and the Ford Foundation. No funds are currently available.
(See Implementation of Phase III)
